B1 expressed in writing, or involving writing: written instructions a written test
More examplesFewer examplesBritain has no written constitution.We will send you written confirmation of our offer shortly.As witnesses to the accident, we were asked to make written declarations of what we had seen.I'm quite good at speaking Chinese, but I fall down on the written work.The Minister promised to give a written answer to the MP's detailed question.
